mapper.update:
update common_question
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update common_question set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM common_question WHERE 1=1
AND cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND sid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND star = #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND answer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND addtime >= #{addtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AND addtime < #{addtime,jdbcType=BIGINT} + 604800
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
